ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The dissolute will be in a Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the wicked shall be in the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the evil-doers will be in hell
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed the sinners are in hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, the wicked will be in the blazing Fire (Hell),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely the wicked are in burning fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the libertines shall be in a fiery furnace
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! the wicked verily will be in hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: whereas the wicked will be in Hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily the ungodly shall be in a Scorch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed the vicious shall be in hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Wicked - they will be in the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, the Fujjar (the wicked, disbelievers, sinners and evil-doers) will be in the blazing Fire (Hell),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But the wicked, indeed they shall be in the Fiery Furnace,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: While the wicked will be in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:14] and indeed the profligates, the disbelievers, shall be in Hell-fire, a scorching fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! the wicked) Kildah and his fellow disbelievers (verily will be in hell;
